name: It's a Banana, How Much Could it Cost?
description: Your opponent loses 1 queue slot next turn. You gain $10.

immediateEffect.script: Player.Money += 10; Log(PlayerDisplayName + " gains $10 from the banana!");

hooks.OnQueuePhaseStart: Battle.QueueSize -= 1; Log(OpponentDisplayName + " is confused by the banana! Queue reduced!");
